chess

Class Checkmate

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Checkmate

  • public class Checkmate
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for analyzing chessboard to see if a a king is under check
    Author:
    Tyler Latawiec, Brian Huang

    • Constructor Detail

      • Checkmate

    • Method Detail

      • isCheck

        public static int isCheck(GameBoard gb)
        Method to determine if chess board is in a state of check
        Parameters:
        gb - - accepts current state of chess board
        Returns:
        1 (valid check), -1 (invalid check e.g. player moves into check), 0 (no check)

      • isCheckmate

        public static boolean isCheckmate(GameBoard gb)
        Method that checks if the state of the board is in checkmate
        Parameters:
        gb - - Current state of chess board
        Returns:
        true - if state of board is in checkmate, false if not

      • isStalemate

        public static boolean isStalemate(GameBoard gb)
        Method that checks if board is in a state of stalemate
        Parameters:
        gb - current state of chess board
        Returns:
        true or false whether the board is in stalemate or not
